job.title: Full Stack Software Engineer
job.description: ltpgtOptomi in partnership with a major sports association who is looking for a junior level Full Stack Developer This association is looking for someone eager and willing to have all hands on deck The ideal candidate will work well in a collaborative environment and obtain great communications skills Join a team of proud passionate and caring people that together share their diverse talents and backgrounds to serve the members of the associationampnbspltpgtltpgtampnbspltpgtltpgtltstronggtMust Have Skills RequirementsampnbspltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtBachelors Degree BS in Computer Programming Computer Science or related fieldampnbspltligtltligt2 years experienceltligtltligtFull stack development experienceltligtltligtHas worked with Ruby on RailsampnbspltligtltligtTest driven developmentltligtltligtWeb frameworksltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtWhat The Candidate Will EnjoyltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtWorking for a major sports association to design develop test deploy maintain and improve softwareltligtltligtManaging individual project priorities deadlines and deliverablesltligtltligtHelping build a worldclass team and cultivate innovationltligtltligtLeading designs of major software components systems and featuresltligtltligtMentoring and training other team members on new technologies design techniques and coding standardsltligtltulgtltpgtltpgt
